mapper.select: SELECT PDSSEQ, MEMBERID, TITLE, CONTENT, FILENAME, NEWFILENAME, READCOUNT, DOWNCOUNT, REGDATE FROM PDS ORDER BY PDSSEQ DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PDS(PDSSEQ, MEMBERID, TITLE, CONTENT, FILENAME, NEWFILENAME, READCOUNT, DOWNCOUNT, REGDATE) VALUES(PDS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memberid}, #{title}, #{content}, #{filename}, #{newfilename}, 0, 0, SYSDATE)
